thread.title: Appaloosa More Than Triples Share Stake In Apple

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Appaloosa More Than Triples Share Stake In Apple
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Appaloosa:
* MORE THAN TRIPLES SHARE STAKE IN APPLE - SEC FILING
* UPS SHARE STAKE IN FACEBOOK BY 67.6 PERCENT TO 5.5 MILLION CLASS A SHARES - SEC FILING
* TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 3.9 MILLION SHARES IN T-MOBILE - SEC FILING
* UPS SHARE STAKE IN ALTABA BY 89.3 PERCENT TO 8.9 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* CUTS SHARE STAKE IN WESTERN DIGITAL BY 76.7 PERCENT TO 600,000 SHARES - SEC FILING
* MORE THAN TRIPLES SHARE STAKE IN APPLE TO 4.6 MLN SHARES - SEC FILING
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2CmrRSi ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2zJRjl2 )
